attributes.action: Stop the Premier League having Game played Abroad
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: On the 7th Feb 2008, Richard Scudamore and the 20 Premiership clubs began talks to play 1 game a year abroad, This petition is designed to stop such plans and keep alive the premier league!

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
